StoreTraceOnError: Store trace/verbose logging in memory, but if an error occurs write to the logs
SetLogLevelInstruction: Set the logging level per component or set a global logging level for all components.
DetailsDebug_InfoBody: When Verbose is set, the server records a large amount of data which may slow down system performance.
DetailsAllDebug_InfoBody: All logging levels are set to Verbose. When Verbose is set, the server records a large amount of data which may slow down system performance.
